title: MarketWatch - Retiring Abroad: What to Know About Life in Panama
description: Kris Cunningham never expected to move to Panama in retirement. But she and her husband did just that about a decade ago and live happily in a city of about 83,000 people near the Pacific Ocean. She'll discuss her experiences with Silvia Ascarelli, the author of MarketWatch's "Where Should I Retire?" column, and answer questions from the audience.
